channel.title: È stato configurato un canale di conversazione vocale tramite testo

description.1: Questo server ha una configurazione del canale Text to Speech dedicata in {channel}, si prega di pubblicare messaggi in quel canale per generare audio.
description.2: Se sei un amministratore del server, puoi cambiare o rimuovere il canale [su questo dashboard server]({url}).

description.1: The speaker you selected does not eixst, please use the autocomplete options or [set a default voice]({url}).
description.2: If this continues to happen, please ask in our [support server]({url}), thank you.

description.1: Audio generation doesn't grow on trees! Support us with a [quick vote on top.gg]({url}), it allows people to find {name} more easily, thank you for your support!
description.2: Voting for me will allow you access to generate {newamount} characters instead of just {amount} for the next 12 hours!

error.title: Si è verificato un errore durante il generamento

description.1: This usually happens if the input language does not match the language of the speaker, try changing the input language or the speaker.
description.2: Se pensi che questo sia un errore, segnalalo sul nostro [server di supporto]({url}), grazie.

button.invite_tts: Get a 2nd Text to Speech Bot

novc: You're not connected to any voice channels.
noplayer: Text to Speech isn't used at the moment, use {command} first!
toolong: Your message exceeds the servers limit of {max} with {count} characters.
alreadyplaying: Wait until the audio by {user} is done playing, use {command} if it's stuck.

set.only_you: This setting only applies to you.
set.default_voice: The default voice is now set to {voice}.

cts.enabled: Chat to Speech has been enabled.
cts.disabled: Chat to Speech has been disabled.
